name: Flashlight 3D
description:
Welcome to the Elysium.

You woke up in a room. All you have is a torch. Find the keys, use the fuel, start the generator, and watch your back. Survive, and GTFO. 

Input: WASD, Left Click, & F

The game is made within 3 weeks and inspired by Flashlight. 

Made by Alex Guo, Cooper Yang, Hank Feng, Ivory Xu, James Yuan
